column1: GENERIC MARKING PRINCIPLE 5:  Marks should be awarded using the full range of marks defined in the mark scheme for the question (however
column2: the use of the full mark range may be limited according to the quality of the candidate responses seen).

column1: GENERIC MARKING PRINCIPLE 6:  Marks awarded are based solely on the requirements as defined in the mark scheme. Marks should not be awarded with grade thresholds or grade descriptors in mind.
